column4: Cases Pending Trial from the Previous Year (Col.4)
column5: Cases Sent for Trial during the Year (Col.5)
column6: Total Cases for Trial during the Year (Col.6) = (Col.4+5)
column7: Number of Cases Withdrawn by Govt. (Col.7)
column8: Number of Cases Disposed by Plea Bargaining (Col.8)
column10: Cases in which Trials were Completed (Col.10) = (Col.11+12)
column13: Total Cases Disposed off by Courts (Col.13) = (Col.7+ Col.8)
column14: Cases Pending Trial at the End of the Year (Col.14) = (Col.6 - Col.11)

column3: IT - Computer Related Offences (Section 66 and Section 66B to 66E)
IT - Publication/Transmission of Obscene/ Sexually Explicit Content
IT - Breach of Confidentiality/Privacy & Disclosure of Information in Breach of Contract
IPC - Fabrication/Destruction of Electronic Records for Evidence
